name: festo多款产品存在拒绝服务漏洞
product: ["festo MSE6-D2M-5000-CBUS-S-RG-BAR-VCB-AGD", "festo  MSE6-E2M-5000-FB13-AGD", "festo  MSE6-E2M-5000-FB37-AGD", "festo MSE6-E2M-5000-FB44-AGD", "festo  MSE6-E2M-5000-FB43-AGD", "festo MSE6-E2M-5000-FB36-AGD", "festo MSE6-C2M-5000-FB44-D-M-RG-BAR-AMI-AGD", "festo  MSE6-C2M-5000-FB43-D-M-RG-BAR-M12L4-MQ1-AGD", "festo  MSE6-C2M-5000-FB36-D-M-RG-BAR-M12L4-AGD", "festo  MSE6-C2M-5000-FB43-D-M-RG-BAR-M12L5-MQ1-AGD", "festo  MSE6-C2M-5000-FB44-D-RG-BAR-AMI-AGD", "festo  MSE6-C2M-5000-FB36-D-M-RG-BAR-M12L5-AGD"]
description: MSE6-D2M-5000-CBUS-S-RG-BAR-VCB-AGD,MSE6-E2M-5000-FB13-AGD,MSE6-E2M-5000-FB37-AGD等均为工控组件。festo多款产品存在拒绝服务漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取服务器控制权。
solution:
厂商已提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：
https://www.festo.com
patch: festo多款产品存在拒绝服务漏洞的补丁
